最早是从直播知道这款游戏的。一见到就特别喜欢，完全不同于国产网络游戏的小清新，尤其是喜欢欧美恐怖电影的绝对值得入手，代入感一流。玩家少的问题最近合服了，和全球玩家一起，更加happy了。另外，真的很尊重国人，特意出了杨永信的dlc，很良心。非常值得推荐。
不知道是不是家里网络不好反正玩这个游戏不是我会飞就是对面会飞，开加速器也没用。
真的好玩  很上瘾

Знаком с игрой с 2017 года. Что бы кто ни говорил, а игра развивается в правильном направлении. Частые обновления с новыми манами/сурвами, фиксы довольно сильных имб. Конечно, баги и руинеры всё ещё есть, но куда без них в онлайн игре? Полностью играбельно и в соло, хотя с другом в пати становится ещё фановее, да и шансы на победу возрастают. Единственная онлайн игра, в которую всё так же весело играть, будто у меня 100 часов.

游戏很好玩，但是最新的huntress dlc出了以后，就很难受，每一把碰到的都是同一个杀手。这一次的dlc是一个大胆的创新，但是感觉和以前不一样了，没有之前被追的感觉。在这个dlc出之前，每一把游戏都有不一样的体验。无论是被mike吓一跳，或者莫名其妙踩到夹子，还或者是慢慢散步的时候被直接电锯倒地。再也没有以前追逐的刺激，一直被扔刀扔中。像我之前所说，每一把基本上都是一个杀手，虽然不会持续很久，但是给我幼小的心灵带来了严重的创伤QAQ。这几个小时的游戏体验极差。这个杀手出了以后，窗户和木板都损失作用。最新的dlc才出了几个小时，但是我真的很难受，完全改变了游戏的玩法。蓝瘦，香菇。

Les devs dorment-ils?
L'ambiance est devenu toxique et s'est aggravée.

Points positifs:
Jeux dédié aux joueurs aimant le challenge, il est innovant et super fun, les première heures sont les meilleurs car tout est inconnu !
Je le conseil pour tout les adeptes du pvp genre moba, template approfondi pour le tueur et les survivants.

Points négatifs:
-Des tueurs qui "campent" maintenant même des tueurs qui fake pas campe. Genre il se casse, et revient à la charge sans aucune pénalité
-Des tueurs qui"tunnel" campe et ne poursuive qu'un survivant pour s'assurer de son sacrifice ou  jouent sur leur connexion pour  freeze les survivants (les tueurs sont les hôtes des games et lancent de gros download pour gener la co )
-Des survivants qui révelent votre position au tueurs, invoquant des raisons illégitimes.
-Des survivants prémade, qui ne jouent que pour casser les couilles à un tueur X, si il n'y ------Des survivants qui ne vous aident pas. A croire que comprendre ce jeu est trop dur.
-Des survivant qui se suicide si attrapé en premiers.

Des comportements toxique qui m'ont recemment pousser à me suicider des que je constate l'un d'eux.
C'était mon jeu préféré...


Ils nuisent énormément à l'éxpérence de jeu des trois autres joueurs qui n'ont rien demandé...
Et sa devient trop systématique.
Des survivants autistes, qui ne comprennent qu'un tueur qui campe perd énormément de temps, faites les générateurs au lieu d'aller donner votre c** c'est un sacrifice pour un bien, merci.

Un jeu génial mais avec une petite population croisssante de joueurs frustrés, en quêtes d'amour propre.
Je le conseil malgres tout car les joueurs négatifs ne doivent pas être la proue de ce super concept !
A tout les survivants qui se donnent à 200% merci ! Vous êtes un vrai plus pour ce jeux. :)

Pour finir, un petit mot pour les développeurs, le point de talent Chili and Barbecue doit être nerf ! BBQ plus le camping ?
Vous voulez qu'on tombe en depression ou quoi?
FAITES QUELQUE CHOSE !!

I just got hit having got out of a trap through a window which should be impossible but the game makers have made it possible for the killer to do unimaginable things!

I have come back to it in 2018 and its now fun...to...die.....still

some thoughts from us:
[list]
    [*]we would really love some high school map, the lockers would fit perfectly and after all High School is the godmother of horror.
    [*]we would love to have more (free) creativity with our survivors (survivor mains)
    [*]probably a hard task, but did you think about a ghost who could walk through some walls (limited) (would fit to high school)
[/list]

some thoughts to the bunny killer:
of course as survivor I think all killers are op, because they are my enemy :p

what really disturbs me with the bunny is, that I was never seen from so far across the map from someone other than her.
It's insane to make running away almost worthless, when she can throw axes through the windows/over the pallets you put down as barriere. The killer just feels really op, and it's completely boring to play against her already, when 9 out of 10 trials are against her (for me).

really positive:
I never experienced all those bad matchmaking problems everyone else apparently did.
I never experienced the toxic community? I always had friendly guys, except camping killers

what leads me to my biggest issue:
Faaaace campiiiiing

dooon't do this please or make it stop (devs, this is to you).
You could stop it with I dunno if a killer stands longer than 10 seconds next to a hook he gets a big disadvantage? 
I mean killer have weakpoints too! Jason Vorhees is afraid of water, Freddy Kruger afraid of fire. Do something with this!

CONCLUSIO:
Love this game. Devs pls don't kill it. Community pls don't kill it, because I wanna play this FOREVER!

Hat die Positiven Kommentare nicht verdient.
Ich denke, das sind mal diese fgts die denken das spiel zu hypen obwohl es kacke ist und es dann einfach positiv bewerten.
Das Spiel ist mehr unausgereift als No Man's Sky am release. 
Jedes Match bekomme ich ein Killer der Kämpt wie ein Sniper in bo3. 
Dann helfen dir deine Team m8s nichtmal und rennen lieber weg, oder helfen dir so, das der Killer direkt wieder dir in den Rücken schlitzt. 
Dann kommt noch dazu das wenn man mal am gewinnen ist und wenn das den Killer anpisst das er einfach disconnected und was heißt das, genau, man wird auch aus dem Match geschmissen und man kriegt kein rank up oder einfach so ein down rank und man kriegt weniger Blutpunkte.
Beste ist sowieso das ich ständig einfach so down ranks kriege weil das Spiel Verbindungsprobleme des Grauens hat. Bsp. Ich wollte einer Runde joinen werde dann automatisch raus geschmissen und kriege 3 down ranks. WTF????. Und das passiert sau oft.
Es liegt nicht mal an meinem Internet, ich habe ein konstante 15 ping, 400k Leitung, alle anderen spiele habe ich doch auch keine Verbindungsprobleme.
Die meisten Killer sind viel zu strong, das man dann auch noch so was wie den Doc einfügt, der aus der Ferne wie ein Templer aussieht, dein gehirn fickt und komischer weise immer weis wo du bist. Oder diese Bunny alte die mit Äxte auf dich wirft und ne 3 km hitbox aufweist. Achja die Äxte können auch 90° drifts hinlegen. Ne ganz ehrlich was soll das, soll das die Combat Axt aus cod darstellen? Komplett unbalanced.
Ihr kauft hier kein Spiel, sondern Herzinfakt für 20 euro. Ich wünschte ich würde mein Geld wieder kriegen hat sich nicht gelohnt.

Vine buscando cobre y encontré oro. 
En serio, no quiero extenderme mucho, pero es un juegazo que te proporcionará horas y horas de diversión. Tampoco hay tanta gente tóxica como dicen (al menos a mi aún no me he topado con nadie así), las partidas se encuentran rápido (lo mismo, hablo desde mi experiencia), los personajes muy conseguidos y variados, así como tambien los mapas. Lo único, pues los DLC que tanto daño le están haciendo a los jugadores y al mundo de los videojuegos en general, pero no comprarlos no influye en encontrar menos partidas ni nada de eso, tan solo que no podrás jugar tu con X personaje. En definitiva, una muy buena compra.

super

Survival-horror with a lot of characters, they are divided in Killers (chasing survivors, breaking generators) and Survivors ( making generators and pallet-chasing killer). it is a little bit pay-to-win since you must purchase DLCs in order to get teachable perks but you can also wait to get them in "Shrine Of Secrets". You can customize your character with clothes (90% trash clothes but there are also pretty nice-looking ones). You can buy in-game currency (Auric Cells) in order to buy survivors/killers or cloths. This game is also kindda buggy since you can easily find one every 3 games. Overall a good game to be played with friends (maximum 4 for Survive With Friends or 5 if you play Kill Your Friends) if you you ignore the bugs.
Grade: 4/5

Абсолютно имбалансный майкл маерз, который убивает с 1 удара. Просто ломает геймплей.
А недавно еще добавили охотницу, которая метает топоры и окончательно ломает геймплей игры - доски, мансы - все это теперь бесполезно. Если охотница умеет играть ты труп.
Но последней каплей стали топоры охотницы, которые ложат тебя с одного попадания. Приехали. Конечная.

After the last few Updates I will have to change my review to negative. The devs keep pumping out new killers and perks  while ignoring major issues with the game. The new chapter outright broke the game. New map is unplayable, major lag, random dc's, getting stuck on random crap, unable to pick up downed survivors and so on. 
And there is the grind.... For new players that want to get some good perks unlocked the grind is insane. 1st you need to buy the characters for real money (or grind for non-licenced ones) and than spend tens of millions of bloodpoints on that char and the char that you will want to use the perk on. Each time they release new killers and survivors the grind get more crazy... so after 5 years we have 24 killers and 27 survivors. Thats 153 Perks to unlock and to do it you need to lvl each char to lvl 40 at least. The random aspect of the bloodweb and the fact that each perk has 3 tiers will make sure that the process of getting what you want is eaven longer. 
I love the game but if the devs stay on this course they will kill it.

this game is superb once you get into it. i'm not one for big reviews but i can say one thing or two. first thing is sometimes it can take upto an hour just trying to get a game and then when you finally do you get booted and you need to join again and again. then if you do get a game and it just starts and the killer leaves you get nothing, no point but the worst thing i think is.....if the killer does leave and youv'e loaded yourself with top of the range items in your load out YOU LOOSES THEM ALL  plus you get No points iether. then there the LAG... you know i think we all know about that in the game. but over all it's a great game. buy it on a steam deal.

Оценка - 9\10.

Jogo focado no online e coop com mais 3 players vs 1 killer. A graça está nas possibilidades de terminar uma partida, utilizando das perks (habilidades) presentes em cada survivor, assim como presentes no killer. Atualmente há inúmeras builds e perks e sempre que lançam uma atualização de dlc aparecem novas deixando o jogo mais dinâmico. Por ser um jogo de partidas rápidas é bem interessante de se jogar a qualquer momento.

Pós: É um jogo bem divertido para se jogar com amigos ou sozinho que poderá te trazer muitas risadas e até mesmo boas amizades que tenho até agora. Excelente jogabilidade, muito melhor que sexta-feira 13. Com As novas atualizações o a interface ficou visualmente melhor, e agora o jogo conta com salvamento do seu progresso na nuvem, o que antes não tinha. Agora é possível você comprar skins e até mesmo DLCs com o dinheiro do jogo! Pra você que joga muito poderá economizar além de divertir bastante.

Contra: É que a cada atualização sempre trás algum bug (Que a equipe constantemente vem corrigindo). Algumas personificações de personagem só é possivel compra através de dinheiro real e não são baratos (Nada que atrapalhe na game play). A cada atualização os  devs continuam nerfando os survivors e buffando os killers, o que pode acabar enjuando do jogo, já que por vezes se você joga de killer pode demorar mais de 30 minutos pra achar jogadores, mesmo pra um jogo com mais de 3 milhões de cópias vendidas na steam.
E assim como sexta-feira 13, trás apenas um modo de jogo, que poderá fazer com que enjoe rapidamente (ou não).

Vale a pena comprar? 
Definitivamente sim, proporciona muitas horas de diversão mas recomendo que esperem uma promoção visto que sempre esse jogo sempre fica pela metade do preço, podendo pelo mesmo preço adquirir uma DLC.

Dieses Spiel macht viel Spaß und die Runden gehen meist recht schnell, ist also optimal für zwischendurch :). Nur manchmal gibt es Killer die es schaffen durch Campen vor dem Haken oder extremes laggen die Runde zu versauen.
什么破游戏
O jogo é desbalanceado demais. A comunidade (principalmente os "mains" survivors) é toxica. Mas este é o melhor jogo do gênero. Voce só precisa ignorar o chat e se divertir ^^

As a disclaimer, I came to this game a little late (June of 2017) and therefore did not have to contend with all of the early major bugs. I also adore horror so I am totally biased in that department, HOWEVER, this game has sucked me in. I'm addicted. I'm primarily a solo RPG gamer, so this was a huge shift from my comfort zone. 

Here's what impressed me:
*The maps are procedually generated to a certain degree so that every game feels slightly foreign. 
*The tension of the game is fantastic from both the Killer and Survivor perspectives and keeps the horror element alive throughout each match.
*It doesn't shy away from the gore.
*Great game to play with random people, but it really shines if you play "Survive with Friends" mode, as it adds an extra layer of comaraderie.
*When playing as the killer, if another player is greifing you, you just murder them. It's fun, you should try it. 

What annoyed me:
*While the bugs do not break the game, it does make certian matches grueling when pallets and such don't respond as they should. 
*The matchmaking system is a little flawed. Don't be surprised if you end up facing an OP expereinced opponent while you're still new. 
*Finally, you have to patient in the lobby sometimes while waiting on a game. I keep my sociology textbook at my desk so I can study while waiting. Seriously, read a book, knit a scarf, learn another language in the downtime. You'll be impressed by what you accomplish. 

I would recommend this game 100%. The free DLC that are released on a semi-regular basis is nice, and the paid DLC are not that over priced, either.

如果是冲着屠夫来玩的就算了吧，屠夫太垃圾，走地屠夫死追一局都追不上一个人（如果人类技术好的话），高端局只有护士，护士，护士。人类的话体验不错，但是屠夫体验太差了。也许后续补丁可以加强屠夫，但是体感来说很难，屠夫在这个版本对于新手和轻度玩家来说太强了已经，然而高分对战屠夫输多赢少，别跟我说屠皇，那都是练起来的护士。游戏还可以，但是平衡性比较差，而且很难平衡。

Dead By Daylight is an awsome game to play with friends or alone. If your into running for your life from 6ft crazy murderors, and one murderors midget, then this is the game for you.
However you may want to be prepared for some very glitchy moments, that will either have you laughing till your stomach hurts, or cursing the game for how broke it is. Once you manage to get in a game, you will have a blast!

There are many things in the game that could use fixing, and perhaps adding more game modes, as it would be fun to go against more than one killer.
Lo recomiendo porque la idea de juego esta genial. Pero tiene DEMASIADOS bugs.

DBD เป็นเกมที่กลับมาเล่นได้เรื่อยๆ สามารถคงความสนุกของเกมแนวนี้เอาไว้ได้ดี มีการยกระดับและเพิ่มเกมเพลย์ได้ดีเสมอมา มีตัวละครให้เลือกเล่นหลากหลายตัวละครทำให้เบื่อยาก ความยากในเกมเล่นอยู่ในระดับปานกลางเหมาะสำหรับคนที่จะเริ่มเล่นไปจนถึงระดับสูง มีการลดคาราเพื่อหาผู้เล่นค่อนข้างบ่อยนับเป็นการตลาดที่ดี แต่ปัญหาที่ผมเห็นมีอยู่สองอย่างคือหาห้องนานมากและสมดุลของเกม ซึ่งปัญหาสองข้อนี้จะพบในเกมแนวนี้ทุกเกม ย้ำว่าทุกเกม แต่อย่างไรก็ตามหากคุณอยากลองหาเกมแนวนี้เล่น DBD ก็เป็นตัวเลือกที่ดี
好!

Gioco con ottime potenzialità,diverte molto specialmente se giocato in compagnia. Sconsiglio questo gioco xk considero vergognosi i numerosi bug presenti che non sono ancora stati risolti. Ultimamente poi quando si gioca in premade con amici  non si riesce a trovare le partite per un errore che si presenta di continuo. 
Considero ridicolo anche il fatto di continuare a pubblicare nuovi DLC volti ad arricchire il gioco invece di risolvere i numerosi problemi.La recensione rimarrà negativa finche il gioco non sarà sistemato come si deve con aggiornamenti che funzionino a dovere.

Aggiornamento al 6/9/17

Il problema delle lobby premade sembra essere risolto anche se l'attesa per una partita continua ad essere infinitamente lunga. Restano ancora dei bug da risolvere come alcuni perk che non funzionano (tempo prezioso o borrow time) bug grafici o di animazioni come pezzi di pallet che volano quando  viene distrutto.
Un ultima cosa che crea parecchio fastidio sono le persone che abbandonano la partita quando vengono prese in spalla dal killer oppure i killer stessi che abbandonano la partita perchè il cancelli di uscita sono stati alimentati; tutte queste persone NON VENGONO PUNITE A DOVERE con ban temporanei per esempio facendo derankare e perdere oggetti a chi magari vuole fare una partita seria.

Aggiornamento al 19/08/2018

Dopo quasi un anno di inattività sono tornato a giocarci sperando in miglioramenti che ci sono stati in parte: molti bug sono stati risolti ma se permettete vorrei riuscire a giocare anche da killer,non è possibile che per trovare una partita debba aspettare 15 minuti !
Inoltre speravo che in questo anno avessero risolto il problema delle hit wifi attraberso le finestre ma rimangono ancora! 
Infine i survivors che escono dalle partite per ira o per qualsiasi altro motivonon vengono ancora puniti a dovere rovinando la partita a tutti i player in gioco!
very good

Das Spiel bietet trotz simplen Spielprinzips viele Stunden Spaß und Mögichkeiten.
Durch die Horroratmösphäre und die Möglichkeit das Spiel mit Freunden zu Spielen gibt es einen besonderen Kick.
Dazu kann man sich durch längeres Spielen auch Perks dazuverdienen, was jedes einzelne Gameplay verändert.
Im Großen und Ganzen ist es ein sehr lohnenwertes Spiel das man zu jeder Zeit schnell mal Spielen kann und auch lange Zeit Spaß bereitet.

非対称マルチプレイ専用鬼ごっこゲーム。
鬼（キラー）は凶悪な力でサバイバーを追い詰め、サバイバーはわずかなスキルやチームワークを駆使してキラーからの脱出を図るのを目的とするゲーム。
なのだが、現状は逆。サバイバーがキラーを弄ぶゲームとなっている。

サバイバーにはキャラクターとして複数おり、それぞれ固有パークがあるが、ティーチャブルというシステムですべてのキャラクターのスキルが時間とゲーム内ポイントをかけることで習得可能となっているため、時間をかけたプレイヤーは固有パークをいいとこ取りした超人サバイバーを作り出すことができる。
キラーに殴られても自力回復できる、半無敵状態になってゴリ押しで味方を助けられる・・・。
など、条件付のパークもあるとはいえキラーをプレイするにはストレスが溜まる要因が多い。

また、同じ場所をぐるぐるしていればキラーに追いつかれないいわゆる「強ポジ」もある。


そんな、殺されるスリルの薄れた超人と化したサバイバーがやることは、「キラーを挑発すること」。
本来キラーが索敵につかうための音をわざと立てたり、障害物を挟んで屈伸したり、手に持っているアイテムをカチカチと目の前で鳴らしたりとマナーの悪いプレイヤーがはびこってしまっている。
サバイバー優位の調整を施されてしまっているため、このような状況になってしまっているのだ。
なので、もう少しサバイバー側が知恵とアイテムを駆使すればキラーから逃げられるというようなバランス調整を希望したい。

現状、キラーのプレイヤー数が体感では少なく、サバイバーでプレイするときのマッチング時間が長くなってしまっている。

悪い点は上げつつも、このサバイバーとしてもキラーとしても味わえるスリルは、ほかのゲームではきっと味わえないだろう。
キラーから逃げたり隠れたりするときのドキドキや、救助や治療など仲間と協力してしてプレイできたときの喜び、キラーとして能力でサバイバーをじわじわ追い詰め処刑できたときの喜びはひとしおだ。
キラーとしてプレイするなら、心の余裕を持ってプレイすることをおすすめするし、サバイバーなら4人いるからと調子に乗らず、画面の向こうにもプレイヤーがいることを考えてプレイしてほしい。
Jogo bastante interessante, trazendo em um jogo uma situação onde apenas ficava-se na imaginação, fugir de um serial killer, devido a alguns bugs ainda no jogo, o mesmo é muito bom.
Atmosfera unica e gameplay originale, nessuna lamentela.

Soooo I played this game now since 130h and I still love it, it's just so much fun when you play it with friends or even alone.
There are a few lobby bugs and graphic glitches but I can live with it. :)

Играю в данную игру с 2017 года и с уверенностью могу сказать, что игра заслуживает оценку 7/10. Она очень интересная в первое время( где-то до 300ч), в это время ты ещё реагируешь на маньяка и действительно стараешься от него убегать или прятаться. Но даже когда ты привык к маньяку ты начинаешь гнаться за рангом, а после за прокачкой всех персонажей, поэтому игра наскучит ещё не скоро, но есть одно но. Это проблема с серверами, которая произошла в конце 2018 года, а именно перестало искать игры за маньяка ( то есть ищет очень долго, примерно 5-15 мин), из-за этого потерялась половина функционала. Но игра вообщем очень даже неплохая и я бы порекомендовал поиграть в данный продукт.
이 씨발 죻망겜 짱깨 타이완 일본 병 신새끼들 두루두루모여서 병 신짓에 살이마 짱깨새끼들은 핵이 일상다반사고 스피드핵에 맵핵인지 살인마 다보이고  개병 ㅡ신같은 짱깨 중국인새끼들 진짜 길거리에서보이면 배때지 갈라서 창자 뜯어버릴거   한국서버에 짱깨들이왜있는데 진짜 죻같이운영하는 운영자새끼들도 배떄지갈라야됨

This game is basically two games in one. You can either play as a survivor with your main goals being, to escape the killer, repair generators, and work with your team. However as a killer you play solo and try to hunt down each and every survivor before they can escape. If you get bored of playing survivor play some killer, and vise-versa.
